column1: How much did you pay for transport to the pay point?
How long did you wait in the queue before you were attended to?
Did you know before you came what documents you had to bring with you?
Did any official ask you for money or a favour in order to help you?
Did the staff manage queues well?
Did the staff treat you respectfully?
What kind of grant did you come for?
Do you think that this pay point will learn from this survey and improve their service?
Was any money deducted from your grant payment?
Do you know how to make a complaint at this pay point?
Do you think that the pay point will respond to a complaint?
How easy is it for you to get to the pay point?
Did you feel safe at the pay point?
Did the staff work hard to help people?
Are you aware of any money lenders outside this pay point?
